title: Aakash Chand
data:
Aakash Chand (born 18 December 2004) is a Nepalese cricketer, who plays as a bowler for Nepal national team.[1] On 4 February 2024, he was named in the squad for the series against Canada.[2]
He made his ODI debut for Nepal in 2nd ODI against Canada, on 10 February 2024.[3] On 9 March 2024, he made his T20I debut against Hong Kong in a Friendship Cup.[4] This biographical article related to cricket in Nepal is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
